name: Push Trump
description:
Push Trump

A short dungeonscript game in which you push a bad man into pools of water.

Made in a couple of days while figuring out dungeonscript. Control with the arrow keys to turn and move.

Avoid Security Guards who will grab and trap you. Robot dogs will follow and obstruct you.

R to restart the level. Feel free to zoom in on your browser to your comfort level.

Background music is a chiptune cover of Thought Contagion by Muse, covered by Florio003. Link: Thought Contagion 8bit

Enjoy!
